entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 39. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
